parameters.content:
# Video Generation Orchestration v2

Supports:
- Multiple ratios per job
- Platform-specific banners via ffmpeg
- Organic templates (no banners)

## Loop through ratios
Each ratio gets its own Creatomate render

## Add platform banners
ffmpeg API adds banners per platform

parameters.query:
SELECT
  p.full_name,
  p.display_name,
  p.voice_id,
  p.voice_settings,
  a.photo_avatar_id,
  a.motion_avatar_id
FROM avatars a
JOIN persons p ON a.person_id = p.id
WHERE a.id = '{{ $json.body.avatar_id }}'

SELECT rendered_urls 
FROM client_backgrounds 
WHERE id = '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.background_id }}'

SELECT cb.rendered_urls
FROM templates t
LEFT JOIN client_backgrounds cb
  ON cb.client_id = '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.client_id }}'
  AND cb.category = t.bg_wide_override
  AND cb.is_default = true
WHERE t.code = UPPER(REPLACE(REPLACE('{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.template_id }}', 'ad-', ''), 'organic-', ''))
AND t.bg_wide_override IS NOT NULL

SELECT

  p.voice_id,

  a.motion_avatar_id

SELECT rendered_urls 
FROM client_backgrounds 
WHERE id = '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.background_id }}'

SELECT cb.rendered_urls
FROM templates t
LEFT JOIN client_backgrounds cb
  ON cb.client_id = '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.client_id }}'
  AND cb.category = t.bg_wide_override
  AND cb.is_default = true

AND t.bg_wide_override IS NOT NULL
